reviewText: Jimmy Perry and David Croft's It Ain't Half Hot Mum, Wonderful comedy, so it doesn't fit into the overbearing rules imposed nowadays. Who cares its just so funny in a characterization type of way. This collection is excellent value. Drawing as it does on the two writers wartime experience and set in India it's incomparable.

This DVD set was a gift for a couple who loved this television show while it was being broadcasted. They never expected to be able to watch it on DVD-- YEARS later!! Although I have only seen an episode or two of It Ain't Half Hot Mum' I must say, if people remember loving it-- they will love it again. It was such a joy to see them laugh and smile while viewing this (foreign to me) show!
